channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- VK All in One Expansion Unit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- VK All in One Expansion Unit

item.title: CVE-2023-0937|2023-03-20T15:52:18.503Z -- unknown -- vk%20all%20in%20one%20expansion%20unit
item.description: The VK All in One Expansion Unit WordPress plugin before 9.87.1.0 does not escape the $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] parameter before outputting it back in an attribute, which could lead to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting in old web browsers

item.title: CVE-2023-0230|2023-02-27T15:24:26.720Z -- unknown -- vk%20all%20in%20one%20expansion%20unit
item.description: The VK All in One Expansion Unit WordPress plugin before 9.86.0.0 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
